page.title: 20GOOLE DOMESDAY TEAM
page.content:
In 1085 when William the Conqueror's first Domesday Book was produced, relatively few people were actually involved in its compilation, although many thousands of people had to be consulted. So it is with the 1986 version. This block for the Goole area has been surveyed by five of the local schools, involving many children aged 8 to 13 and staff. Those involved were:
Bartholomew Middle School Boothferry Middle School Pasture Road First School Parkside First School St.Joseph's R.C.Primary School
